title: Coralstone Block
summaries: Coralstone Blocks are decorative blocks. When placed, they can have one of the many kinds of coral on it. Much like Sunplate Blocks, Coralstone Blocks show a special, non-changing image if a square of nine or more are put next to each other. In this case, the image is a coral that looks much like a sponge.

On [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version, Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version, and [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader version, they have a chance to be awarded from the Angler.
